name: Norwex
0:
”Alexa, ask norwex where is my package”
”Alexa, start norwex”
”Alexa, open norwex”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: norwex
Developer Terms of Use
des:
With Norwex’s Alexa skill, you can ask about your deliveries before they arrive. When you sign up for your online order with Norwex, you can ask Alexa where your package is or when it’ll arrive to hear the latest status.

Example interactions:
"Alexa, ask Norwex where’s my package",
"Alexa, start Norwex",
"Alexa, open Norwex",

Set-Up Steps: 
Go to your Norwex order confirmation email, and go to the tracking page for that order.
1) Sign up for Alexa Shipping & Delivery Updates.
2) Enable this skill, if you haven’t already done so.
3) Repeat this for any other orders you’d like to be notified about.

Troubleshooting:
1) Make sure you’re signed up. You must sign up for each order. Follow the set-up steps to sign up. Your order must be with Norwex.
2) Contact Norwex customer service: If you need assistance with your order or delivery, contact Norwex customer service.
